required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Holmium Laser vs Bipolar Enucleation of a Large Volume BPH: a Randomised Controlled Study
clinical_study.official_title: Holmium Laser Enucleation Versus Bipolar Plasmakinetic Enucleation of a Large Volume Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia: a Randomised Controlled Study

brief_summary.textblock: To compare bipolar plasmakinetic enucleation versus holmium laser enucleation for management of large BPH.

detailed_description.textblock: To compare safety and efficacy of bipolar plasmakinetic enucleation (BPEP) versus holmium laser enucleation (HoLEP) for management of large BPH (>80gm).

primary_outcome.description: difference in hemoglobin concentration postoperatively vs preoperatively

secondary_outcome.description: intraoperative and postoperative complications including blood transfusion, capsular perforation, irritative symptoms, SUI, urethral stricture, bladder neck contracture, urinary retention.

an international commonly used score ranging from 0 - 35 (the worst is 35) evaluating voiding and storage urinary symptoms using 7 questions each one is scored from 0 to 5 according to severity of symptom

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life (QoL) section of International prostate symptom score (IPSS)
secondary_outcome.description: one question scored from 0 up to 6 (6 is worst)

arm_group.arm_group_label: HoLEP holmium laser enucleation of the prostate
arm_group.description: holmium laser enucleation of the prostate

arm_group.arm_group_label: BPEP bipolar plasmakinetic enucleation of the prostate
arm_group.description: bipolar plasmakinetic enucleation of the prostate

intervention.intervention_name: Holmium laser enucleation of the prostate
intervention.description: cystoscopic transurethral enucleation of the prostate using Holmium laser (Asclepion MultiPulse HoPlus 110W and Lumenis pulse 100W and 120W)
intervention.arm_group_label: HoLEP holmium laser enucleation of the prostate

intervention.intervention_name: Bipolar plasma kinetic enucleation of the prostate
intervention.description: cystoscopic transurethral enucleation of the prostate using bipolar plasma kinetic energy (KLS Martin Maxium or Covidien Force Triad)
intervention.arm_group_label: BPEP bipolar plasmakinetic enucleation of the prostate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients suffering from LUTS secondary to infravesical obstruction from BPH
- failed medical treatment
- International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) > 13
- a peak urinary flow rate (Qmax) < 15 ml/sec
- a prostate size â‰¥ 80 gm
Exclusion Criteria:
- presence of a urethral stricture
- neurological disorder
- bladder cancer
- prostate cancer
- previous history of bladder neck surgery or TURP
